name: Dead Memes Soundboard - MLG FX
description:
Dead Memes - The Soundboard has the sweetest and tastiest dead memes the app store has to offer.
The soundboard has over 300+ of the best memes, dank sounds, mlg, troll & classic vines

Features:
-Add Favorites & Create Custom Soundboards
-Loop Tracks, Slow Down & Speed Up
-Global Stats - See What's Popular Around the World!
-Search Memes!

Plus loads more like fun animations, easter eggs and a hidden soundboard to find!

Prank your friends now with this amazing soundboard or just sit in a dark room and amuse yourself.

Featuring spicy gems like:

-Johnny Johnny, Yes Papa
-Flextape!
-BIT CONNECCTTTTTTTTTT
-Somebody Touch My Spaghet
-Show Me The Way
-Hugh Mungus
-What Are Those?
& many many more.


This app has the best meme sounds you can find in the internet today. Probably.


*** I DEFINITELY FORGOT SOME MEMES ***

Send me any I missed or suggestions to deadmemesapp@gmail.com & I'll add them to the next update. Probably.
